!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.runtime 4 2 Feb 10, 2004 11:12:48.813
!MESSAGE Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-
in: "org.eclipse.core.runtime".
*** Bug 51477 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Fixed. The decorator was enabled by default and caused the cvs ui plugin to be
initialized in a non-ui thread. The fix was to ensure that console font/color
initialization is done in the ui thread.
*** Bug 51491 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
